item.title: [GRA/RBX/SBG][Collaborative solutions] - Exchange update

Current status : Resolved

Mar 4, 15:34 UTC

Feb 25, 15:37 UTC
Update - Update :93% have been done on the 6.65T since the 24/02

Feb 23, 16:32 UTC
Identified - The estimated time for the Filerz to return to normal is 1 to 2 weeks.

We will come back to you when this backup full is finished. We apologise for the inconvenience.

Feb 22, 13:32 UTC
Update - Root cause : A full backup is currently in progress on this filerz.

We will get back to you as soon as we have more information about the timing of this backup.

Feb 22, 13:08 UTC

Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA1
Scope of impact : All websites hosted on filerz34
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently investigating to identify the cause of the slowdowns.

item.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Loss of connectivity
item.description:
Mar 3, 16:18 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/03/2022 01:00 UTC
End Time : 03/03/2022 16:01 UTC
Service impact : We do not encounter any disruption on the national network

Mar 2, 09:59 UTC
Monitoring - The server is available again and we are seeing a resolution of the requests. We invite you to restart your modem if you do not see any improvement.

Root cause : The incident is due to an unavailable Kosc login server.

The incident will be monitored for the next 24 hours to confirm full resolution.

Mar 2, 08:35 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 2, 07:48 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/03/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : Disruptions on the national network leading to lack of connections.
Ongoing actions : Interventions with the various service providers have been initiated and we are making every effort to restore services as soon as possible.

item.title: [SPAIN][VoIP] - Incoming calls
item.description:
Mar 3, 03:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/03/2022 11:38 UTC
End Time : 03/03/2022 02:50 UTC

Current status : Resolved

Mar 3, 01:03 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : We expect that the dysfunctional incoming calls of the VoIP to Spanish subscribers will be resolved today on the 03/03/2022 before 07:00 UTC.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Mar 3, 00:08 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/03/2022 11:38 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.
